docs.title: CHARACTERISTICS
docs.text:
• emulate & Offline Program Generation
  • Support KUKA, ABB, UR and other brands of robots
  • Support for custom bots and other hardware
  • Supports multiple construction processes
  • KUKA & ABB Communication & Control

docs.title: ABOUT
docs.text: FURobot is a robot simulation and tool software，It supports multiple brands of bots and custom bots，It comes from FabUnion.

docs.title: CUSTOM TOOL HEAD 1
docs.text: Learn more about customizing the tool header

docs.title: CUSTOM BOTS
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to build a two link robotic arm from scratch，and do motion simulations.

docs.title: CUSTOM TOOL HEAD 2
docs.text: explained in detail： 1. How to Get Rigidbody Transforms for Tool Heads 2. How to set up toolheads for multiple materials

docs.title: COORDINATE SYSTEM
docs.text: This tutorial isKUKAExamples of robots，explained the root coordinate system，Flange coordinate system，Concept of tool end coordinate system and target plane coordinate system

docs.title: QUICK START
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to generate a simple motion trajectory from scratch

docs.title: INSTALL
docs.text: Demonstrates how to install and register FURobot

docs.title: 特点
docs.text:
• 仿真 & 离线程序生成
  • 支持 KUKA, ABB, UR 和其他品牌的机器人
  • 支持自定义机器人和其他硬件
  • 支持多种建造工艺
  • KUKA & ABB 通信与控制

docs.title: 关于
docs.text: FURobot 是一个机器人仿真与工具软件，它支持多种品牌的机器人和自定义机器人，它来自 FabUnion.

docs.title: 自定义工具头 1
docs.text: 详细讲解了如何自定义工具头

docs.title: 自定义机器人
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何从零开始搭建一个二连杆机械臂，并进行运动仿真

docs.title: 自定义工具头 2
docs.text: 详细讲解了： 1. 如何获得工具头的刚体变换 2. 如何设置多种材质的工具头

docs.title: 坐标系
docs.text: 本教程以KUKA机器人为例，解释了根坐标系，法兰坐标系，工具端坐标系和目标平面坐标系的概念

docs.title: 快速入门
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何从零开始生成一段简单的运动轨迹

docs.title: 安装
docs.text: 演示了如何安装与注册 FURobot
